com.gensym.util
Class BeanImageBuffer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--com.gensym.util.BeanImageBuffer
public class BeanImageBuffer
extends Component

Beans need icons to represent them in bean builders typically 32x32 and 16x16 icons This code allows an image to be scaled to 32x32 for storage within the beaninfo file. When the beaninfo is asked for an icon, it is able to reconstitute the image from the buffered data in the case of 32x32 , and a 16x16 scaled version of the 32x32

See Also:
